naslov: Stanići, kuća s 3 stana, garažom i pogledom na more (prodaja)
opis: Prostrana kuća s više stambenih jedinica, garažom i pogledom na more – Stanići, Omiš Predstavljamo vam veliku kuću s više stambenih jedinica, smještenu u slikovitom mjestu Stanići, svega 6 km od Omiša i 700 metara od mora i plaže. Kuća se nalazi u mirnom okruženju, idealnom za obiteljski život ili turistički najam, s prekrasnim pogledom na more s viših etaža. Nekretnina se proteže kroz tri etaže, s ukupno devet spavaćih soba i više dnevnih prostora, tri odvojene stambene jedinice, velikom garažom i dodatnim parkirnim prostorom za više vozila. Svaka etaža ima poseban ulaz, što omogućuje potpuno neovisan boravak više obitelji ili gostiju. U prizemlju se nalazi komforan trosobni stan, dodatna ljetna kuhinja s ostavama, a na katu i visokom potkrovlju smješteni su dodatni stan i apartmani s prostranim terasama i balkonima s pogledom na more. Kuća je okružena njegovanim vrtom, ima ukupno 6 klima uređaja, komarice na svim otvorima, te mogućnost odvajanja brojila za struju. Garaža površine 37 m² pruža sigurnost za 2 vozila, uz dodatnih 5 vanjskih parkirnih mjesta. ________________________________________ Zašto baš Stanići? Stanići su poznati po prekrasnim plažama, čistom moru i mirnoj, zelenoj okolini koja nudi idealan balans između privatnosti i blizine sadržaja. Udaljeni su samo nekoliko minuta od Omiša, grada s bogatom poviješću, vrhunskom gastronomijom i brojnim sadržajima za svakodnevni život ili aktivan turizam – od raftinga i planinarenja do kulturnih događanja. Do Splita i međunarodne zračne luke stiže se za manje od sat vremena. ________________________________________ Dodatne informacije: • Površina kuće: 3 etaže + terasa + garaža • Prizemlje: 125 m2 • 1.kat: 149 m2 • 2.kat.120 m2 • Garaža 37 m2 • Površina zemljišta: ukupno 527 m² • Pogodno za turističko iznajmljivanje, obiteljski život ili kombinaciju Prodaje se po cijeni od 699.000,00 €. Kupac plaća agencijsku proviziju. • Kontakt: Tonka Tomić +385 91 534 9959 t.tomic@remax.hr Dodatne informacije o nekretnini, njezinoj točnoj lokaciji i razgledavanje mogući su nakon potpisivanja Ugovora o posredovanju s Agencijom, koji je u skladu sa Zakonom o zaštiti podataka i Zakonom o posredovanju u prometu nekretnina. ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- House with 3 apartments and a beautiful sea view Spacious house with multiple residential units, garage and sea view – Stanići, Omiš We present to you a large house with multiple residential units, located in the picturesque town of Stanići, just 6 km from Omiš and 700 meters from the sea and the beach. The house is located in a quiet environment, ideal for family life or tourist rental, with a beautiful sea view from the upper floors. The property extends over three floors, with a total of nine bedrooms and multiple living areas, three separate residential units, a large garage and additional parking space for several vehicles. Each floor has a separate entrance, which allows for a completely independent stay for several families or guests. On the ground floor there is a comfortable three-bedroom apartment, an additional summer kitchen with storage rooms, and on the first floor and high attic there are additional apartments and apartments with spacious terraces and balconies with sea views. The house is surrounded by a well-kept garden, has a total of 6 air conditioners, mosquito nets on all openings, and the possibility of separating the electricity meter. The 37 m² garage provides security for 2 vehicles, with an additional 5 outdoor parking spaces. _____________________________________ Why Stanići? Stanići is known for its beautiful beaches, clear sea and peaceful, green surroundings that offer the ideal balance between privacy and proximity to amenities. It is only a few minutes away from Omiš, a town with a rich history, excellent gastronomy and numerous amenities for everyday life or active tourism - from rafting and hiking to cultural events. Split and the international airport can be reached in less than an hour. ________________________________________ Additional information: • House area: 3 floors + terrace + garage • Ground floor: 125 m2 • 1st floor: 149 m2 • 2nd floor: 120 m2 • Garage 37 m2 • Land area: total 527 m² • Suitable for tourist rental, family life or a combination For sale at a price of €699,000.00. The buyer pays the agency fee. • Contact: Tonka Tomić +385 91 534 9959 t.tomic@remax.hr Additional information about the property, its exact location and viewing are possible after signing the Agency Agreement with the Agency, which is in accordance with the Data Protection Act and the Real Estate Brokerage Act.
